bio: Traductora e intrprete de holands/castellano, traduce e interpreta la vida a su manera, residente en un pueblo del suroeste de Madrid, convive con "Y tan Pancho", la naturaleza, aprendiz de ornitloga, piscina.. no puede sin sus paseos, cmara y prismticos, bici, buena msica, amig@s y dems gente...--//-- Dutch/Spanish Translator & Interpreter translates/interpretes Life on her own way, living in a village in the southwest of Madrid, together with "Y tan Pancho", nature, learning ornithologist, swimming pool.. Can't live without trekking, camera and binocular, biking, good music, friends and other people... Norbertus College (Roosendaal, Holanda) Hogeschool Enschede (Enschede, Holanda) Escuela Oficial de Idiomas (Madrid) Fatima School (Roosendaal, Holanda) Araspe www.marabrans.com traductora, intrprete, revisora, intermediaria internacional / translator & interpreter, international intermediary
